meta.title: One-Click Website Data Scraper | Crawlora
meta.description: Effortlessly scrape data from any website with Crawlora. AI-powered, perfect for tech & startups. Get started now!

ldJson.name: Crawlora
ldJson.description: Crawlora simplifies web scraping for tech companies and startups with AI-powered data extraction.

servicesData.title: Everything you need for easy data scraping

services.title: Proxy-Based Scraping
services.description: Scrape anonymously and avoid IP bans with our secure proxy network. Features include IP rotation, speed, and overcoming geo-restrictions.

services.title: URL-Based Scraping
services.description: Extract data from any web page using URLs. Our service ensures accurate and efficient data collection.

adventajesData.title: Unlock the Power of Crawlora: Key Benefits

adventajes.title: Custom Plugin Support
adventajes.description: Create personalized scraping tools with our intuitive customization options. No coding experience required!

adventajes.title: Region-Specific Scraping
adventajes.description: Target specific regions to gather the most relevant data for your needs. Analyze market trends, monitor competitors, or gather localized information.

brandsData.title: Scrap Data With Your Custom Plugins
brandsData.description: Tailor Your Data Collection: With Crawlora's custom plugin feature, effortlessly create personalized scraping tools tailored to your unique needs,Integrate your custom plugins seamlessly into Crawlora, enhancing efficiency and expanding possibilities.

tiers.title: Starter
tiers.description: Best option for personal use & for your next project.

tiers.title: Enterprise
tiers.description: Best for large scale uses and extended redistribution rights.

footerData.description: Unlock the power of advanced data extraction and analysis with our powerful, flexible, efficient, and extensible data extraction from URLs.
